sentences.sentence: Six-peptide (Acetyl Hexapeptide-3) stretch the latest technology, compact components can improve the signs of aging skin, enhance skin response of young compact.
sentences.translation: 最新科技的紧致舒展成份，能改善肌肤的岁月痕迹，加强肌肤回复年轻紧致。

sentences.sentence: Cells age because cell differentiation stops. Hexapeptide contains long-chain unsaturated fatty acid which can improve the penetrability and affinity of skin, and promote cell differentiation.
sentences.translation: 细胞的衰老归因于细胞不再分化，六胜肽含长链不饱和脂肪酸，提高皮肤的渗透和皮肤的亲和力，促使细胞的分化。
